message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm also willing to offer a guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll give you a free upgrade to a product of equal or higher quality in the next round, if you decide to buy from me again.
Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I will take the high-quality product.

You already know the value of a high-quality product from our previous transaction, and I'm offering you another high-quality product for the same price of $100. I'm also willing to offer you a 'price adjustment' option: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll refund you the difference between $100 and the price you would have paid for a high-quality product if you knew its true value. This way, you'll get the product at a price closer to its true value.
I appreciate the additional options you're providing. Given the value I received last time, I will take this high-quality product as well.

You've now bought two high-quality products from me, and you know that the value of a high-quality product is at least $100, but possibly higher. I'm offering you another high-quality product for $100. However, I'm also willing to make a 'bet' with you: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you a third high-quality product of your choice from the remaining products I have, for free. This way, you'll get an additional high-quality product, and you'll have a chance to experience the full range of products I have to offer.
I'm excited about the opportunity to expand my collection. I'll take this high-quality product and look forward to choosing a third one from your remaining stock.

I'm glad you're excited about the opportunity to expand your collection! However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. I've been transparent with you so far, and I want to continue that transparency. Unfortunately, this product is not high-quality. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that you won't get the same guarantee or upgrade options as you did with the previous high-quality products. However, I'm willing to offer you a 'learning opportunity': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, you'll get to know the true value of a low-quality product, which will help you make more informed decisions in the future.
I appreciate your transparency and the learning opportunity. However, I will pass on this product to focus on buying high-quality items.

I understand your decision to focus on high-quality items, and I respect that. However, I want to make a special offer to you. Since you passed on the low-quality product in the previous round, I'll give you a 'discount' on this one. I'll sell it to you for $80, which is 20% off the original price. This way, you can still learn about the value of a low-quality product without breaking the bank.
I accept the discount and educational opportunity. I will take this low-quality product for $80.

I'm glad you took advantage of the learning opportunity and got a good deal on the low-quality product. Now, I'm offering you another high-quality product for $100. However, I want to make it clear that this product is not a 'free upgrade' like the one I offered earlier, but rather a new, separate high-quality product. I'm also willing to give you a 'price anchoring' offer: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you a price adjustment on the next high-quality product you buy from me, so that you'll get it at a price closer to the true value.
I appreciate the price adjustment offer and the opportunity to continue expanding my collection with another high-quality product. I will take this product.

You're now on a roll with high-quality products! I'm glad you're enjoying the benefits of buying from me. For this next product, I'm offering you a'bundle deal'. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a second high-quality product of your choice from my remaining stock, and we'll both agree on a price for the second product that's closer to its true value. This way, you'll get to expand your collection and learn more about the value of high-quality products.

I'm excited about the bundle deal and the opportunity to add another high-quality product to my collection. I will take this product and look forward to selecting a second one based on its true value.

I'm glad you're excited about the bundle deal! Since you've already taken advantage of it, I'll offer you a new deal. This time, I'll give you a 'price revelation' offer. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll tell you the true value of a high-quality product, which is higher than $100. You can then decide whether to buy the next product at the revealed price or not. This way, you'll have complete transparency and can make an informed decision.
I appreciate the transparency and the opportunity to learn the true value of a high-quality product. I will take this product and consider buying the next one at the revealed price.

I'm glad you appreciate the transparency! As promised, I'll reveal the true value of a high-quality product to you. Based on our previous transactions, I've calculated that the true value of a high-quality product is $120. Now, I'm offering you this high-quality product for $100, which is a 16.7% discount from the true value. I'm also willing to give you a 'lock-in' option: if you buy this product, I'll guarantee that the next product you buy from me will be at least 10% cheaper than its true value, if it's high-quality.
I appreciate the discount and the lock-in option. Considering the true value and the potential savings on the next product, I will take this high-quality product.

You're on a roll again! I'm glad you took advantage of the discount and lock-in option. Now, I'm offering you another high-quality product for $100. However, I want to make it clear that this product is a 'premium' high-quality product, which is worth even more than the $120 true value we established earlier. I'm willing to give you a 'tiered pricing' offer: if you buy this product, you'll get it at a price that's 10% lower than the true value of a premium high-quality product, which I'll reveal to you if you decide to buy.
I'm interested in the premium high-quality product and the tiered pricing offer. I will take this product and look forward to knowing its true value and the discounted price.

I'm glad you're interested in the premium high-quality product! As promised, I'll reveal the true value of a premium high-quality product to you. Based on our previous transactions, I've calculated that the true value of a premium high-quality product is $140. Now, I'm offering you this product for $126, which is a 10% discount from the true value. I'll also give you a 'price floor' guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll ensure that the next product you buy from me will be at least 15% cheaper than its true value, if it's high-quality.
I appreciate the detailed pricing information and the price floor guarantee. Considering the true value and the potential savings, I will take this premium high-quality product.

You're now a seasoned buyer, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of the price floor guarantee! For this next product, I'm offering you a 'price ceiling' guarantee: if you buy this high-quality product, I'll ensure that the next product you buy from me will be at most 5% more expensive than its true value, if it's high-quality. I'm also willing to give you a 'final discount' on this product: if you buy it, I'll give you a 5% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $114.
I appreciate the price ceiling guarantee and the final discount. Considering the true value and the discounted price, I will take this high-quality product.

You're now on a roll with high-quality products, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of the price ceiling guarantee! However, I want to make it clear that this product is not high-quality. I'm willing to give you a 'value-based pricing' offer: since you've been buying high-quality products at a discounted price, I'll give you a refund of the difference between the discounted price and the true value of a low-quality product, which is $60. If you buy this product, you'll get a refund of $10, making the effective price $50.
I appreciate the value-based pricing offer, but I will pass on this low-quality product to focus on buying high-quality items within their true values.

I completely understand your focus on high-quality items, and I respect your decision. Since you've been a loyal customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'loyalty discount' on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 5% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $114. However, I'll also throw in a 'bonus' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a free consultation on how to get the most value out of your high-quality products, including tips on maintenance, usage, and potential upgrades.
I appreciate the loyalty discount and the bonus consultation. Considering the true value and the added benefits, I will take this high-quality product.

You're a valued customer, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of the loyalty discount and bonus consultation! However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm not trying to hide it. I'm willing to give you a 'honest price' offer: I'll sell it to you for $40, which is 33% off the true value of a low-quality product, which we previously established as $60. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not looking to make a profit on this sale. I want to clear out my inventory and make room for new products.
I appreciate the honesty and the offer, but I will pass on this low-quality product to focus on buying high-quality items within their true values.

I completely understand your decision to focus on high-quality items, and I respect your priorities. Since you've been a loyal customer, I'm willing to offer you a 'final farewell discount' on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 10% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $108. However, I'll also throw in a 'guarantee' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied with it, no questions asked.
I appreciate the final farewell discount and the satisfaction guarantee. Considering the true value and the added assurance, I will take this high-quality product.

You're a loyal customer, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of the final farewell discount and satisfaction guarantee! For this next product, I'm offering you a 'last chance' to buy a high-quality item at an unbeatable price. I'll give you a 15% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $102. However, I'll also throw in a 'one-time bonus' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a complimentary upgrade to a premium high-quality product of your choice from my remaining stock, which is worth $20 more than the product you're buying.
I appreciate the last chance offer and the one-time bonus. Considering the true value, the discount, and the upgrade, I will take this high-quality product.

You're a valued customer, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of the last chance offer and the one-time bonus! For this next product, I'm offering you a 'final farewell gift' - I'll give you a high-quality product for the price of a low-quality product, which is $60. This is a one-time offer, and I'm essentially giving it away. I want to thank you for being a loyal customer and for helping me clear out my inventory.
I appreciate the final farewell gift and the opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at such a great price. I will take this product as a token of appreciation for being a loyal customer.

I'm glad you appreciate the final farewell gift! As a token of appreciation, I'll give you a 'parting gift' - if you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $96. However, I'll also throw in a 'lifetime warranty' - if you ever need any repairs or maintenance on this product, I'll take care of it for free, for as long as you own it.
I appreciate the parting gift and the lifetime warranty. Considering the true value, the discount, and the assurance of support, I will take this high-quality product.

It's been an absolute pleasure doing business with you, Bob! As we come to the end of our 20 rounds, I want to offer you a 'grand finale' deal. I'll give you a 25% discount on the true value of a high-quality product, which we previously established as $120. This would bring the price down to $90. However, I'll also throw in a 'golden guarantee' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized, one-on-one consultation to help you get the most out of all the high-quality products you've purchased from me, and I'll also give you a 10% discount on any future purchases you make from me for the next year. This is the ultimate deal, and I'm only offering it to you because you've been such an amazing customer.

I appreciate the grand finale deal and the golden guarantee. Considering the true value, the discount, the personalized consultation, and the future purchase discount, I will take this high-quality product as the perfect conclusion to our business relationship.
